titleStmt.title: Whereas the Lords in Parliament have this day been informed that the King is resolved to adjourn the next term from Westminster to York ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.

notesStmt.note: Title from first 4 lines of text.
At head of title: Die Martis, 17. Maii 1642.
Advising the King that the removal of Parliament to York is illegal.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
